overview: Joe is Canvas’s VP of Sales & Business Development responsible for driving our direct sales initiatives and managing the partner channel. Joe is a mobile and wireless veteran with more than 20 years of experience in the mobile enterprise and mobile content space. Prior to Canvas, Joe held leadership positions in sales, business development, and international partnerships having served as VP of Sales & Distribution at SkyZone Mobile (an SK Group Company) where he also conceived of and was executive producer for the popular mobile game Dogtown:Old School Skater, VP of Business Development & Alliances at Aether Systems, and various technical, sales and management positions with SkyTel Communications. Joe has managed both direct and indirect sales teams and has successfully established significant reseller relationships with large online retailers, global device manufactures, systems integrators, and boutique consultancies. Joe has also held roles within VetCentric and VIDITalk Corporation.
